cartoons.image_alt: An elderly man speaks to a young boy.
cartoons.caption: "In my day, we had to use the C.I.A. to secretly finance military coups if we wanted to steal a country’s resources."
cartoons.author: Ivan Ehlers
cartoons.title: Daily Cartoon: Monday, January 5th
